column4: Hey hey - was wondering if anyone can help me mount a windows hard-drive so i can listen to the music that's on it?
sudo fdisk -l then whatever drive is ntfs: sudo mkdir /media/windows; sudo chmown $USER:USER /media/windows; sudo mount -o umask=000 /dev/hda1 /media/windows   <--or something
i left the $ off second user but you get the idea
